nodes.text: Calliope Station was a former Con Star Mining Corporation station on the planet Parnassos that survived a nuclear cataclysm that reduced the planet to a barbaric, post apocalyptic state. During the New Republic Era, the Scyre warrior Siv sought refuge there after being abandoned by her former leader Phasma, who accompanied General Brendol Hux into the First Order. Siv lived there for the next ten years, giving birth to a child named Torbi.
